Clip.Title: FIGHTING IRISH OF THE CIVIL WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Irish Brigade, or Fighting Irish were new arrivals to America, proud soldiers who fought on side with Americans in the Civil War, paving the way for all immigrant groups that followed.

Clip.Title: FIGHTING IRISH OF THE CIVIL WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Irish Brigade along with with their exiled leader fought for the Union in the Civil War with much courage, battle after battle.

Clip.Title: BORN FIGHTING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Senator James Webb traces the early battles and evolving personality quirks of a group in Scotland that, centuries later, would help forge the American spirit.

Clip.Title: BORN FIGHTING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Senator James Webb goes on a personal journey to trace the story of the Scots-Irish, from their exodus to the New World in the 1700s to their massive cultural and political influence on America today.

Clip.Title: FIGHTING IRISH OF THE CIVIL WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Irish Brigade, or Fighting Irish were new arrivals to America, proud soldiers who fought on side with Americans in the Civil War, paving the way for all immigrant groups that followed.

Clip.Title: BORN FIGHTING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Senator James Webb traces the early battles and evolving personality quirks of a group in Scotland that, centuries later, would help forge the American spirit.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the waters of Juan de Fuca Strait to Gulf Islands National Park Reserve, Vancouver Island's Southern Coastline is a rich palette of incredible sea life and natural beauty.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the waters of Juan de Fuca Strait to Gulf Islands National Park Reserve, Vancouver Island's Southern Coastline is a rich palette of incredible sea life and natural beauty.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: MISSION CRITICAL: AMPHIBIAN RESCUE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow the race to first find and them rescue the Mountain harlequin frog before the deadly chytrid fungus wipes out the entire species after 200 millions years on Earth.

Clip.Title: NATURE'S DIVE BOMBERS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Along the South African Coast, the Cape Gannet colonies feast on the East Coast, while those on the West Coast starve and struggle to survive due to commercial fishing.

Clip.Title: LAMALERA, THE ULTIMATE BATTLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the remote village of Lamalera, people have survived by the age-old method of harpooning sperm whales, but as the whales are dying out, some want to embrace modernity by fishing with motors, while others fear the death of their traditions, leading to serious conflict.

Clip.Title: DENYING THE MOON LANDING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Apollo astronauts and scientific experts reflect on NASA's glorious achievement, and the shock of having their accomplishments questioned 40 years later.

Clip.Title: CONSUMED
Clip.Episode: Inside the Belly of the Beast
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A study into how aspiration and ownership needs have driven our culture to focus so heavily on consumption.

Clip.Title: EGALITE FOR ALL
Clip.Episode: Toussaint Louverture and the Haitian Revolution
Clip.EpisodeSummary: At the turn of the nineteenth century was Haiti's revolution, the only successful slave insurrection in history and the creation of the world's first Black republic. The man at the forefront was Tousssaint Louverture who led the army of slaves that would change history.

Clip.Title: LIONS IN BATTLE 2
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Forced from their homes and separated from their family forever, two juvenile lions are required to grow up quickly on the Okavango Delta in Africa.. Strangers in their own land, both brothers must lean on each other to survive. Witness their remarkable rite of passage into adulthood as they learn to hunt, fight, and mate, never giving up hope to one day become protectors and providers of their own dynasty.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the St. Lawrence River and into the Gulf of St. Lawrence, an aerial survey above the Gaspe peninsula reveals a set of natural wonders - from the Blue Whales to the stone marvels.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In this new season, fly from coast to coast along the vast and diverse terrain that lies at the border of Canada and the United States.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANTS IN THE ROOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The largest creature that walks this planet is shrouded in mystery. It is the elephant; majestic, intelligent, dangerous. They can be man's best friend ... or his worst enemy. This is the story of an elephant called Wonky Tusk. She is the matriarch to her five family members. One of her impressive tusks point backwards and this makes her instantly recognisable. But she is famous for quite another reason...

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
